We are the Berlin chapter of the CocoaHeads community. We meet once every month, usually every 3rd Wednesday of the month, and talk about iOS and OS X development.

If you're into Cocoa and in Berlin, come by and say Hi!

Twitter Vimeo Groups

We're also on Meetup.

Next Meeting

Jan 21st, 2015, 7pm @ GetYourGuide Deutschland GmbH

Location

GetYourGuide Deutschland GmbH
Erich-Weinert-Straße 145, 4th floor
10409 Berlin

(map)

Talks

  • Alex Denisov: Clang Compilation Process
  • Marcio Klepacz: How we integrate & deploy Mobile Apps with Travis CI

Free pizza and beer courtesy of GetYourGuide. Due to location constraints participation is limited to 60. So hurry up and RSVP before all seats are gone…

RSVP

Are you interested in giving a talk? Send an email to Engin!

Recent Meetings

Dec 17th, 2014

  • Objective-C is far from dead: improving quality of code by leveraging less known features of Objective-C and LLVM - Krzysztof Zabłocki - @merowing_
  • Xcode Plugins - Jarek Pendowski - @iloveshw

November 19th, 7 pm @ Wooga Auditorium

Anton Makeev from the AppCode team will talk about how AppCode saves time for many daily tasks such as refactoring and writing tests.

This meetup is going to be in a workshop fashion. Please install AppCode 3 if you'd like to follow Anton's examples hands-on.

Oct 15th, 2014

  • iOS Accessibility – Robb Böhnke – @ceterum_censeo
  • BloodMagic: custom property attributes for Obj-C – Alex Denisov – @1101_debian

Sep 16h, 2014

  • Introduction to BDD – Paweł Dudek – @eldudi
  • Partnership with MCE 2015: CocoaHeads members get 20% off
  • Drinks sponsored by Blloon

More past talks can be found in the archive.

Location

Usually we meet at:

CodeKollektiv
Großbeerenstraße 79, 3rd floor
10963 Berlin (Kreuzberg)

CodeKollektiv on Google Maps

The closest subway stations are:


U1 U7 Möckernbrücke (~5 min walk from Ausgang Tempelhofer Ufer / Möckernstr)
U6 U7 140 M19 Mehringdamm (~5–10 min walk from Ausgang Obentrautstraße / Finanzamt.)
U1 U6 248 M41 Hallesches Tor (~10–15 min walk)

Drinks and Food

Drinks are available on site for € 1.– per bottle.

Wanna grab something to eat before the meetup? There is a good pizza/pasta place on the corner right next to CodeKollektiv.

Also, there are a lot of food stalls around U Mehringdamm.

About

Organzier: Engin Kurutepe
